items.title: AI-Powered CRM Implementation for SaaS Startup
items.tech_stack: Python, TensorFlow, React, AWS, PostgreSQL, Redis
items.description: Built an AI-powered CRM system with automated lead scoring, predictive analytics, and smart email sequences. Integrated with Salesforce and HubSpot.
items.outcomes: 40% faster sales cycle, 25% increase in conversion rate, 60% reduction in manual data entry, $500K ARR increase

items.title: Cloud Infrastructure Optimization for FinTech
items.tech_stack: Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, Terraform, CI/CD, Datadog
items.description: Redesigned cloud infrastructure for a financial services company, implementing auto-scaling, cost optimization, and improved security compliance.
items.outcomes: 35% cost reduction, 50% faster deployments, 99.9% uptime achieved, PCI-DSS compliance

items.title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard for E-commerce
items.tech_stack: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, D3.js, WebSockets
items.description: Created a real-time analytics platform for an e-commerce marketplace with live sales tracking, customer behavior analysis, and inventory management.
items.outcomes: Real-time insights for 1M+ daily users, 60% faster decision-making, $2M revenue increase in 6 months

items.title: DevOps Automation Platform
items.tech_stack: Python, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, Prometheus
items.description: Built end-to-end DevOps automation platform with CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and automated testing frameworks.
items.outcomes: 70% reduction in deployment time, 90% fewer production issues, 5x faster release cycles

items.title: Machine Learning Pipeline for Healthcare
items.tech_stack: Python, TensorFlow, Apache Airflow, AWS SageMaker, PostgreSQL
items.description: Developed ML pipeline for medical diagnostics with HIPAA-compliant data processing and real-time model inference.
items.outcomes: 95% diagnostic accuracy, 80% reduction in processing time, FDA-compliant deployment

items.title: Microservices Migration for Enterprise
items.tech_stack: Java, Spring Boot, Kubernetes, RabbitMQ, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
items.description: Led migration from monolithic architecture to microservices for enterprise software company serving 10K+ customers.
items.outcomes: 3x improved scalability, 50% faster feature delivery, 40% reduction in infrastructure costs
